overview: The Pittsburgh Steelers of the 1970s won four Super Bowls and fielded some of the greatest teams ever assembled. However, the most important game they ever played was not a Super Bowl, but a 1976 playoff matchup against the Baltimore Colts. Though they couldnâ€™t possibly have known it in the moment, lives were on the line.
tagline: The Pittsburgh Steelers must deliver the Baltimore Colts a defeat for the ages... or else!
title: Section 1
